news.title: Scientists Discover New Species in Ocean Depths
news.shortDescription: Marine biologists have found a new species of fish in the Mariana Trench.
news.fullDescription: A team of marine biologists from the University of California has made a groundbreaking discovery in the depths of the Mariana Trench. The newly discovered species, tentatively named Pseudoliparis marianensis, was found at a depth of 7,500 meters.

news.title: Local Man Claims to Have Invented Perpetual Motion Machine
news.shortDescription: Amateur inventor says his device can run forever without external energy.
news.fullDescription: John Smith, a 42-year-old mechanic from Springfield, claims he has successfully created a perpetual motion machine in his garage. The device, which he calls the 'Energy Infinity Generator,' allegedly produces more energy than it consumes.

comments.author: Marine Biology Student
comments.comment: This is incredible! Deep sea discoveries always fascinate me.

comments.author: Physics Teacher
comments.comment: This violates basic laws of thermodynamics. Perpetual motion machines are impossible.
